graph_title: Prévalence de la consommation actuelle de tabac chez les personnes de 15 ans ou plus (taux comparatifs par âge)
indicator_name: Prévalence de la consommation actuelle de tabac chez les personnes de 15 ans ou plus (taux comparatifs par âge)
SDG_GOAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: Target 3.a: Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 3.a.1: Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator is defined as the percentage of the population aged 15 years and over who currently use any tobacco product (smoked and/or smokeless tobacco) on a daily or non-daily basis.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 3.a: Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 3.a.1: Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
